thread.title: ‘Worst f***ing tweet I have ever seen’: Jerry Seinfeld angers liberals with Black Lives Matter joke
thread.title_full: ‘Worst f***ing tweet I have ever seen’: Jerry Seinfeld angers liberals with Black Lives Matter joke

author: Greg P.
title: ‘Worst f***ing tweet I have ever seen’: Jerry Seinfeld angers liberals with Black Lives Matter joke
text:
— Jerry Seinfeld (@JerrySeinfeld) January 26, 2017 
And here comes the outrage: This is the worst fucking tweet I have ever seen. https://t.co/pvz9zvNsr4 
— Zach Heltzel (@zachheltzel) January 26, 2017 The cheery juxtaposition of casual racism with product placement really makes this one, I think https://t.co/HZr7GiCrL4 
— Alison Herman (@aherman2006) January 26, 2017 jerry,,, rethink this https://t.co/CAq4VkjGUM 
— James Grebey (@jgrebes) January 26, 2017 I bet Michael Richards would love this tweet https://t.co/GbQpRnhjcP 
— Eric Haywood (@EricHaywood) January 27, 2017 This tweet is worse than Bee Movie https://t.co/tOSoRd6ynT
